attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: could you please tell me why in this climate of accountability why the Peak District Nation Park appears to be a "quango" where it seems their word is the final answer to everything. some of the stupid things they are doing is crazy, I have several hundred people ready to sign up to this petition, all are local people,almost every barn conversion has to have brown window frames, and some of the restrictions are ludicrous. etc etc etc. where do the peak district people go to when they want to take grievance further ?

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
